# US Micro Products â€” Comprehensive Site Information

## Company Overview
US Micro Products is a fabless custom display manufacturer headquartered in Austin, Texas, established in 1996. With 25+ years of experience and 6 global offices (Austin, Los Angeles, New York, Shenzhen, Taichung), we serve OEMs across medical, military, aerospace, industrial, automotive, gaming, wearable, consumer electronics, kiosk/POS, instrumentation, marine, and harsh environment markets.

## Core Capabilities
- **Innovation**: 200+ custom display designs completed annually
- **Expertise**: Engineering across TFT, AMOLED, PMOLED, LCD, and touch technologies
- **Service**: Global scale with local engineering support; 5x Inc. 5000 honoree

## Product Categories (450+ Active SKUs)

### TFT LCD Displays (225+ SKUs)
Sizes 0.96" to 84". Panel types: IPS, TN, MVA. Interfaces: SPI, LVDS, MIPI, RGB, eDP, HDMI. Applications: industrial HMI, medical devices, aerospace instrumentation, automotive dashboards.

### AMOLED Displays (77+ SKUs)
Sizes 0.95" to 6.67". Round, rectangular, and flexible form factors. True blacks, exceptional contrast ratios (100,000:1+), ultra-thin profiles. Applications: wearables, premium consumer devices, medical wearables.

### PMOLED Displays (36+ SKUs)
Ultra-low-power OLED modules. Sizes 0.49" to 5.5". Ideal for battery-powered devices, wearables, instrumentation, and IoT.

### Character LCD (45+ SKUs)
Monochrome character modules (8x1 to 40x4). STN, FSTN, VA types. Proven reliability for industrial controls and instrumentation.

### Graphic LCD (20+ SKUs)
Monochrome graphic modules. STN, FSTN, COG options. Custom graphics and status displays.

### Smart Displays (30+ SKUs)
Integrated controller modules. Simplify HMI design with all-in-one display solutions including UART/SPI interfaces.

### Touch Panels (24+ SKUs)
Capacitive (PCAP) touch solutions. Multi-touch, glove-compatible, custom cover glass, optical bonding.

### Open Frame Monitors (20+ SKUs)
Industrial monitors for kiosk, gaming, POS, and industrial integration. Optional touch, VESA mounting, wide temperature.

### Tablets (5+ SKUs)
Custom industrial tablets with ruggedized enclosures.

## Services
- **EMS / PCB Assembly**: SMT, chip-on-board, sub-assembly, box build
- **Display Integration & Bonding**: Optical bonding, cover glass lamination, display-to-housing integration
- **Inventory Management**: JIT inventory, consignment programs, demand planning
- **Logistics & Kitting**: Custom packaging, kitting, global shipping

## Customization Options
Every display can be customized: brightness enhancement, optical bonding, custom cover glass, interface adaptation, connector changes, FPC modifications, backlight customization, temperature range extension, branding, and form factor changes.

## Industries Served
Medical (FDA-ready), Military (MIL-STD), Aerospace, Automotive, Gaming/Casino, Industrial, Wearables, Consumer Electronics, Kiosk/POS, Instrumentation, Marine, Harsh Environments

## Certifications
ISO 9001 certified quality management system
